room_title: Escape room "Curse" by Hundred Acres Manor in Pittsburgh
room_address: 1 Hundred Acres Drive Bethel Park, PA 15102
room_description:
Into the woods...
Through the cabin...
The creatures await your arrival. 

Journey through the once famous cabin within the woods. Be warned those who have previously entered still lurk the halls. The now possessed and souls belong to the darkness and the creatures within.  The darkness controls the cabin and the horror awaits you within.  

Are you ready to enter the woods?
